plot: Bangkok 2010: Sam takes a trip to visit her friend Courtney in the metropolis of Bangkok. This is Sam follows her as she navigates the city from X-mas to New Year & examines what it is to be a young woman today.
title: This Is Sam
plot_es: Bangkok 2010: Sam takes a trip to visit her friend Courtney in the metropolis of Bangkok. This is Sam follows her as she navigates the city from X-mas to New Year & examines what it is to be a young woman today.
plot_en: Bangkok 2010: Sam takes a trip to visit her friend Courtney in the metropolis of Bangkok. This is Sam follows her as she navigates the city from X-mas to New Year & examines what it is to be a young woman today.
